title: Add User Licenses to Subscription
description: A customer needs to add 5 more user licenses to their annual subscription.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current subscription plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the customer's account and sees they are on the 'Pro' plan.

tasks.description: Calculate the prorated cost for the 5 new licenses for the remainder of the subscription term.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the prorated charge.

tasks.description: Update the subscription quantity and process the prorated charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the licenses and charges the card on file.
